    • SQLiteScripts

      public SQLiteScripts()

  • Method Details

    • checkForSQLInjection

      public static boolean checkForSQLInjection(String... texts)
      Checks if any of the provided input strings contain suspicious SQL keywords or characters commonly used in SQL injection attacks.
      Parameters:
      texts - Variable number of input strings to check.
      Returns:
      true if any text is null, blank, or contains SQL keywords potentially indicating injection attempts; false otherwise.

    • deleteTrack

      public static void deleteTrack(DatabaseManager dbManager, int trackID) throws SQLException
      Deletes a track and all related entries from the database, including comments, interactions, resources, and associated links.
      Parameters:
      dbManager - DatabaseManager instance to execute SQL statements.
      trackID - The ID of the track to delete.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs during deletion. Shows an error alert if the deletion fails.

    • getMostRecentResources

      public static List<Resource> getMostRecentResources(DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Retrieves the 5 most recent resources based on their creation date.
      Parameters:
      dbManager - DatabaseManager instance to execute SQL queries.
      Returns:
      A list of the 5 most recently created Resource objects.

    • getMostPopularResources

      public static List<Resource> getMostPopularResources(DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Retrieves resources associated with the top 5 tracks having the most resources. Useful to find the most "popular" resources by track count.
      Parameters:
      dbManager - DatabaseManager instance to execute SQL queries.
      Returns:
      A list of Resource objects belonging to the top 5 tracks with the most resources.

    • getMostCommentedResources

      public static List<Resource> getMostCommentedResources(DatabaseManager dbManager)
      Retrieves the top 5 resources with the highest number of comments.
      Parameters:
      dbManager - DatabaseManager instance to execute SQL queries.
      Returns:
      A list of the 5 most commented Resource objects.
